pyramidHead.tryAgain: Do you want me to try that request again now?

global.serverError: The DISTRO server responded in a way that I couldn't understand. Try again later, or let us know that something is broken.

old: You’re using an older version of
which is not fully supported by DISTRO. We recommend that you upgrade to the
iOS: DISTRO’s current platform is not supported on
noClue: We are unable to identify the web browser you’re using to access DISTRO, so you may experience some unexpected problems. We recommend downloading
, a free web browser from Google.

hover.login: Log in or sign up to keep track of your DISTRO subscriptions
hover.event: Sort by the date of upcoming events
hover.freshness: Freshness – Sort by date added to your music library
hover.admin: Admin – Manage and broadcast music on this network: you own it!
hover.mute: Mute – Hide songs from this network
hover.solo: Solo – Only show songs from this network

subscribe: Subscribe to start receiving music from ^
tutorial.subscribeNorthside: Subscribe to listen to music from Northside Festival (it’s free!)
newMusic: Now that you have subscribed to
this network appears in your Network List and you will automatically receive music

tml.saveError: There was an error saving this track. Try again, and get in touch with us if you keep having trouble.
tml.uploadHover: Upload — Add a new track to this network

errors.badEmail: The email address you entered doesn't look right.
errors.invalidCredentials: This username and password aren't working.
errors.noCredentials: Please enter a username and password.
errors.existingUser: This email address already has an account with DISTRO.

errors.loadFail: Oh, bother! It looks like there was a problem loading this track. Please try again, and let us know if this error keeps happening.
